    private void
    uploadFile()
    Uploads the selected file Calls ProductDAO.bulkUploadFromCsv() to bulk upload products from the selected file Closes the form after upload Displays an alert if no file is selected

    • uploadFile

      private void uploadFile()
      Uploads the selected file Calls ProductDAO.bulkUploadFromCsv() to bulk upload products from the selected file Closes the form after upload Displays an alert if no file is selected
